buffs.description: The undead tribe friendliness can be increased up to 150% by undead unit seals.
buffs.name: Undead Token

buffs.description: Increases darkness resistance to 75 for each 5-star Crow Knight, and 150 for each 6-star Crow Knight. Also increases max darkness resistance through Crown Knights from 2,000 to 4,000.
buffs.name: Darkness Resistance

hidden_abilites: Increases its movement speed by 8%, and its attack range by 10%.
Increases the movement speed and attack power of all units by 5%, and the attack range of all units by 6%.
Significantly increases attack power and critical hit rate against enemy crystal.
Increases darkness resistance by 75 for each Crow Knight, and 150 for each Senior Crow Knight. Also increases max darkness resistance through Crown Knights from 2,000 to 4,000
[ Limit Break of Undead Token ] : The undead tribe friendliness can be increased up to 150% by undead unit seals.
description.skill1: Increases the Undead Tribe Friendliness gained from Human Undead Seals (10%, 30%, 50%, 70%, 100%)
description.skill2: Increase attack speed of Undead units in Outland Battle. (0%, 0%, 4%, 7%, 14%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Crow Knight ]
